metadata.title: CVE-2020-7105 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
async.c and dict.c in libhiredis.a in hiredis through 0.14.0 allow a NULLpointer dereference because malloc return values are unchecked.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7105` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhiredis0.14 - 0.14.0-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hiredis package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.14.0-6').
